description: Polar Bear is a new-age chain of premium ice cream parlours with over 36 flavours- exotic as well as natural.Innovation in ice creams is the name of the game at Polar Bear with its all-time favourite Ice Cream Pizza being the frontrunner. Innovators at Polar Bear scout for the best ingredients all over the world. This effort is reflected in our world class products like Death By Chocolate, Natural Berry flavours, Belgium Chocolate, Rum Jamaica, Ice Cream Pizza and so on.
address: Polar Bear, #8, Gokulam Main Road, Jayalakshmipuram.
